titleStmt.title: A declaration concerning the publike dispute which should have been in the publike meeting-house of Alderman-bury, the 3d. of this instant moneth of December; concerning infants-baptisme. Together, with some of the arguments which should then have been propounded and urged by some of those that are falsly called anabaptists, which should then have disputed. Viz. By Benjamin Coxe. Hanserd Knollys. William Kiffen, &c. Published for the satisfaction of those that desire information

A declaration concerning the publike dispute which should have been in the publike meeting-house of Alderman-bury, the 3d. of this instant moneth of December; concerning infants-baptisme. Together, with some of the arguments which should then have been propounded and urged by some of those that are falsly called anabaptists, which should then have disputed. Viz. By Benjamin Coxe. Hanserd Knollys. William Kiffen, &c. Published for the satisfaction of those that desire information

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
